metadata.subject: France. Armée
metadata.title: Discours prononcé au Directoire du département, le 21 février 1791, l'an 2e. de la liberté, par les commissaires de la Société des amis de la Constitution, séant aux Carmes, M. Barbat Duclosel, père, portant la parole

metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, creased and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
